contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 6, 1981 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Info - British Bandsman. Brass Band News gives result as - 1st Hepworth, 2nd Yorkshire Bus, 3rd Lockwood (which is in fact the order of draw). Programme at National Brass Band Archive also gives same result as British Bandsman. Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 7 bands competed.
June 16, 2014, 1:57 p.m. June 25, 2016, 10:49 a.m.
1 Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths Vizcaya
2 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Paul McCann John O'Gaunt [Vinter]
3 Hade Edge Jack Fisher The Aeronauts
Unknown Result Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Unknown Tournament for Brass
Unknown Result Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Kevin Wadsworth Rhapsody in Brass
Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band J. Kenyon Land of the Mountain and the Flood
Unknown Result Dodworth Colliery MW Brass David Hirst Essay for Brass [Parry]
Withdrawn Lindley Band Nick Hudson
